title: Twitter outage: what happened, when will service be restored, and more
description: Twitter is down for many users across the world right now. Here's everything we know.

title: Nvidia's most important graphics card might launch as soon as April

description: Nvidia announced the launch of its RTX 4090 and 4080 GPU laptops, which also come with a host of other features.

title: Apple extends Buy Now, Pay Later service beta to its own retail staff
description: The long awaited Pay Later service on iOS may be coming soon as Apple continues to venture into the finance world.

title: Many online stores are exposing private customer data
description: Some stores are reckless with their data, leaving sensitive information exposed.

title: Clop ransomware had a rather handy flaw for Linux users to exploit
description: Linux users could easily retrieve data stolen by ransomware as its encryptor had some crucial flaws

title: Zoom becomes the latest tech giant to announce major job cuts
description: Around 15% of Zoom workforce is being made redundant, with other execs taking hefty pay cuts.

title: New Google Lens feature will let Android users (literally) search their screen
description: Google has announced a host of upgrades for its Google Lens service.

title: The latest Google Maps AR update should help you avoid getting lost while traveling
description: Immersive View and Live View should make traveling much easier, at least in the few cities in which they're available.

title: NetSuite: Businesses are learning to live with major global challenges
description: Fears around recession and inflation fall as NetSuite finds workers and bosses are feeling more positive.

title: Many top Android sports and betting apps have some serious security flaws
description: Developers of Android apps aren't handling security very well, researchers claim, as the number of threats grows.

title: HBO Max and Discovery Plus merger plan has changed – and it's your fault
description: Warner Bros. Discovery has lightly backtracked on plans to turn HBO Max and Discovery Plus into a single super streamer.

title: New high-end OLED TVs have a secret weapon, and it makes a massive difference
description: I saw the elite Philips OLED908 TV with a next-gen OLED panel, and its secret weapon is in the reflections, not the brightness.

title: Windows 10 can now run Android apps – but we wouldn’t recommend it

description: The Canon EOS R50 is the camera giant's new entry-level camera – and it finally finishes off the old EOS M series.

title: China is killing off fax machines, pagers, and other classic tech
description: Iconic items such as fax machines and pagers will soon go offline as China prepares for future tech revolution.

title: This free version of Microsoft Teams is disappearing forever soon
description: Microsoft Teams is replacing its free app with another free app, but you won’t be able to transfer your data unless you get a paid plan.
